short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays user input columns and generates prompts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Supercharge your LinkedIn networking with the Network Cat - LinkedIn Prompt Generator Extension for Chrome! Enhance your outreach by effortlessly generating personalized prompts tailored to your role and company. Simply enter your role and company information, and instantly receive three dynamic prompts to engage recruiters and potential referrals.

✓ Boost Networking Success: Craft compelling messages that stand out in the crowd, increasing your chances of connecting with industry professionals and unlocking new opportunities.

✓ Personalized Prompts: Tailor each prompt to include your specific role and company, creating authentic and relevant messages that resonate with your target audience.

✓ Recruiter and Referral Tabs: Seamlessly switch between two dedicated tabs to access three recruiter prompts and three referral prompts, respectively. Discover tailored suggestions that cater to each networking scenario.

✓ Copy to Clipboard: Easily copy any prompt with a simple click! Copy the generated prompts and paste them directly into your LinkedIn messages, saving you time and effort.

✓ Streamlined User Interface: Enjoy a user-friendly interface with intuitive controls, making it a breeze to enter your role and company details and access the generated prompts.

Unlock the power of effective networking with the Role and Company Extension. Elevate your LinkedIn game and make meaningful connections that propel your career forward. Download now!"

This description highlights the key features and benefits of your extension, emphasizes personalization and convenience, and encourages users to download and leverage the power of the Role and Company Extension for LinkedIn networking success.
